concept.title: 1532.111 Contract clauses.

conbody.p: The Contracting Officer shall insert the clause at 1552.232-73, Payments - Fixed Rate Services Contract, in solicitations and indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contracts when services are being acquired on a fixed-rate basis.
